channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's fees on Chinese ships will hurt US companies, maritime executives to tell hearing

Congo rebel leader says sanctions, any minerals deal with US won’t stop fighting in the east
Stocks jump amid signs Trump could scale back tariffs
item.description: Dow surges more than 500 points as White House signals that President Trump might narrow scope of planned tariffs.

item.title: Wildfires in the Carolinas prompt evacuations, emergency declarations
item.description: For the second time in less than a month​, residents in one North Carolina county have faced evacuations due to wildfires.

item.title: 12 dozen lawmakers accused in 8 years. Women in the statehouse weigh #MeToo’s impact

item.title: Conan O'Brien honored at Kennedy Center; Trump targeted by many comics
item.description: As Conan O'Brien was honored with the Mark Twain Prize at the Kennedy Center, many comics targeted President Trump from the stage.

item.title: Gérard Depardieu goes on trial in France accused of sexual assaults

item.title: Austria says it has uncovered a Russian-steered campaign to spread disinformation

item.title: Supreme Court to hear Louisiana race and redistricting case
item.description: The justices are considering a dispute over how Louisiana's congressional districts were drawn after the 2020 census.

item.title: Israeli strike on south Gaza hospital kills senior Hamas official
item.description: A senior Hamas official was killed in an Israeli airstrike on a hospital in southern Gaza on Sunday, the group and the Israel Defense Forces said.
